description: An application that can be used to track cornhole stats over time

scripts.preDev: yarn i && yarn copySharedFiles && yarn build
scripts.start: yarn copySharedFiles && cd server && yarn start
scripts.dev: yarn copySharedFiles && cd server && yarn dev
scripts.docker:start: yarn copySharedFiles && cd server && docker-compose up
scripts.copySharedFiles: copyfiles shared/**/* server/src/_shared -u 1 && copyfiles shared/**/* client/_shared -u 1

scriptsDescription.start: Will start up the node server locally. Assumes the mongodb docker container is already running.
scriptsDescription.docker:start: Will start up the docker containers containing the database and the node server

author: Anton G. Neuhold Jr.
name: cornhole-tracker
